prod_short_desc: Take a break at the junkyard with Disney•Pixar’s Mater and his video screen!
prod_long_desc:
Join Mater in his Easy to Build junkyard as he chats with Lightning McQueen on the video screen, featuring a movable crane and Tow Mater sign. Use the crane to lift the assorted car parts out of the box and attach them to the buildable tow truck, and have fun testing them on this lovable Disney•Pixar Cars 3 character. Includes a simple guide to build and play, and bigger pieces help build confidence in younger kids. LEGO® Juniors is an age-appropriate build and play experience for ages 4-7. Includes a Mater LEGO Juniors character.
Includes a Mater character from Disney•Pixar Cars 3 in his classic pickup form with a crane on the back.
Features an Easy to Build junkyard with a movable crane, Tow Mater sign and box.
Hang the video screen on the crane to help Mater stay in touch with his pal Lightning McQueen!
Play out fun scenes with these popular characters from Disney•Pixar Cars 3.
Includes Easy to Build models with some bigger pieces and a simple guide to get kids building and playing quickly.
Accessory elements include various car parts, a video screen with Lightning McQueen image, Tow Mater sign and a fence.
Mater tow truck measures over 1” high, 2” long and 1” wide.
Crane measures over 3” high, 1” wide and 2” long.
Tow Mater sign measures over 3” high, 1” wide and 1” long.
